events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it does not fit me at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to a sizing problem with the purchased jacket.
Your case has been assigned to our refund specialist, Sarah T., who will assist you further.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket has been worn or if the tags are still attached?
Thank you, Sarah. My order number is 45837291. The jacket is unused, and the tags are still attached as it didn’t fit properly.
We have initiated the refund process for order 45837291. You will receive the full amount back within 5-7 business days once we receive the returned jacket.
Thanks for your quick response and help, Sarah. I appreciate the clear instructions and prompt refund offer.
Your refund case has been resolved successfully. Please ship the jacket back using the prepaid label included in your email.
Checking in to confirm that you have received your refund after returning the jacket. Please let us know if there are any further questions.
Since the refund was successfully processed and no additional issues were reported, we are closing your case now. Thank you for contacting us.
